"Quoted" markup start-string (matched openers & closers) -> no markup:

'*' "*" (*) <*> [*] {*}
⁅*⁆

Some international quoting styles:
‘*’ “*” English, ...,
„*“ ‚*‘ »*« ›*‹ German, Czech, ...,
„*” «*» Romanian,
“*„ ‘*‚ Greek,
「*」 『*』traditional Chinese,
”*” ’*’ »*» ›*› Swedish, Finnish,
„*” ‚*’ Polish,
„*” »*« ’*’ Hungarian,

But this is „*’ emphasized »*‹.
